 ytterligare ett steg. Efter att ha stämplat materialet lagrar

 lagras på detta sätt:

 maintain the credibility of the evidence in a possible court
 trial. To secure our evidence, we create a so-called "hash"
 from it, and stamp the hasch with a qualified signature. This
 guarantees that the evidence is qualitatively secured, and cannot
 be changed. Moreover, we take the security of evidence storage
 even one step further. After being stamped, the material is
 stored in high-security classed computer centers that does not
 allow material to be extracted, distorted and put back in again.
